x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/careteam-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/CareTeam \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"CareTeam","id":"71f37619-366e-4ecd-9c4d-87884d7ae329","contained":[{"resourceType":"Practitioner","id":"pr1","name":[{"family":"Dietician","given":["Dorothy"]}]}],"identifier":[{"value":"12345"}],"status":"active","category":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://loinc.org","code":"LA27976-2","display":"Encounter-focused care team"}]}],"name":"Peter James Charlmers Care Plan for Inpatient Encounter","subject":{"reference":"Patient/example","display":"Peter James Chalmers"},"encounter":{"reference":"Encounter/example"},"period":{"end":"2013-01-01T08:00:00+08:00"},"participant":[{"role":[{"text":"responsiblePerson"}],"member":{"reference":"Patient/example","display":"Peter James Chalmers"}},{"role":[{"text":"adviser"}],"member":{"reference":"#pr1","display":"Dorothy Dietition"},"onBehalfOf":{"reference":"Organization/f001"},"period":{"end":"2013-01-01T08:00:00+08:00"}}],"managingOrganization":[{"reference":"Organization/f001"}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:14.727+08:00"}}'
